description: This quick black bean chilli is delicious with all the trimmings in this quick and simple buddha bowl.
keywords: Poke bowl,Pescatarian,Seafood free,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Halal,Soy free,Wheat free,Vegetarian,Vegan,Tomato,Avocado,Dairy free,Peanut free
name: Black Bean Chilli Buddha Bowl Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 2 medium lime, 1 juiced and zested, 1 cut in wedges
1 large avocado, cut into quarters and sliced

recipeInstructions.text: Heat the oil in a large non-stick pan on medium high heat and add the garlic. Cook for 2 minutes, then stir in the spices and black beans. Cook for 2-3 minutes to coat everything, then pour in the chopped tomatoes and juice of half a lime. Reduce the heat and leave to simmer for 10 minutes.
Cook the quinoa according to pack instructions, pour into a bowl and add the remaining lime juice and zest. Fluff with a fork and set aside.

To assemble, divide the quinoa between 4 bowls, add the shredded lettuce and top with black bean chilli. Add the cherry tomatoes, avocado slices and lime wedges, scatter with fresh coriander and serve.
